Once Eclipse is installed, you can start it and add the Gradle plugin. Therefore:

  • Select "Help" from the menu bar
  • Choose "Install new software"
  • Add a new site (repository) setting
    • Name: Gradle
    • Location: http://dist.springsource.com/release/TOOLS/gradle
  • Select "Extensins / Gradle Integration" -> "Gradle IDE" for installation
  • Press "Next" and continue the installation procedure
  • Restart Eclipse

That's it! You have setup your OpenCms development environment. Read here how to start developing dependent on your development scenario.
